direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods retrieve redemption records but for different types of products (flexible vs. locked).
Both methods handle historical records with similar parameter structures and pagination logic.
Both methods access and return data related to flexible products, albeit for different purposes (position vs. redemption records).

enhanced_by.reason: Both methods require the RequestHandler to be initialized and properly configured.
Fetching the flexible product list can be a prerequisite to understanding the context of redemption records.
Both methods involve verifying redemption records and handling similar exceptions.
